hero-tagline: I develop automation systems, Telegram tools, web and PC systems. I build projects with a focus on structure, stability and development.
about-text: I am a person who finds it important to understand how and why everything works. I am interested in systems: technical, logical, and human. I dislike chaos and random decisions, so I break down any idea into its structure and bring it to a working, stable state.
about-app-3: A system, not a collection of unrelated functions
about-tg-1: Bots as part of a complete system
about-val-3: Thoughtful style in code and interface
